name: Conductor's Top Hat
description: After you switch to the character to which this is attached: Discard the card with the highest original Elemental Dice Cost in your Hand and change 2 Elemental Dice into Omni Element, and spend 1 less Elemental Die the next time the character uses a Skill or plays a Talent. (Once per Round)
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>After you switch to the character to which this is attached:</color> $[K56] the card with the highest original Elemental Dice Cost in your Hand and change 2 Elemental Dice into $[K411], and spend 1 less Elemental Die the next time the character uses a Skill or plays a <color=#FFFFFFFF>{SPRITE_PRESET#3006}Talent</color>. (Once per Round)
descriptionreplaced: <color=#FFFFFFFF>After you switch to the character to which this is attached:</color> <color=#FFFFFFFF>Discard</color> the card with the highest original Elemental Dice Cost in your Hand and change 2 Elemental Dice into <color=#FFFFFFFF>{SPRITE_PRESET#1111}Omni Element</color>, and spend 1 less Elemental Die the next time the character uses a Skill or plays a <color=#FFFFFFFF>{SPRITE_PRESET#3006}Talent</color>. (Once per Round)
